title: Azure Cognitive Services Quiz
description: This quiz tests your knowledge on Azure Cognitive Services.

answerOptions.displayText: Computer Vision, Speech, Language, Decision, Web Search
answerOptions.explanation: Correct; these are the five categories of Azure Cognitive Services.

answerOptions.displayText: Machine Learning, AI, Data Factory, Virtual Machines, Databases
answerOptions.explanation: Incorrect; these are not the correct categories of Azure Cognitive Services.

answerOptions.displayText: Vision, Text Analytics, Sentiment Analysis, Language, Translator
answerOptions.explanation: Incorrect; while some of these are Azure Cognitive Services, the categories are not correct.

questions.correctAnswer: Computer Vision, Speech, Language, Decision, Web Search
questions.title: Azure Cognitive Services Categories
questions.text: Which of the following are the five main categories of Azure Cognitive Services?

answerOptions.explanation: Correct; Face API is used for face detection and recognition.
Incorrect; Custom Vision is used for training custom image classification models.
Incorrect; Text Analytics is used for extracting insights from text.

questions.title: Service for Face Detection
questions.text: Which Azure Cognitive Service is used specifically for face detection and recognition?

answerOptions.displayText: To convert spoken audio to text
answerOptions.explanation: Correct; Speech-to-Text converts spoken audio to text.

answerOptions.displayText: To translate text from one language to another
answerOptions.explanation: Incorrect; that is the purpose of the Translator service.
Incorrect; chatbot functionalities are provided by the Language service.

questions.correctAnswer: To convert spoken audio to text
questions.title: Purpose of Speech-to-Text Service
questions.text: What is the primary purpose of the Azure Speech-to-Text service?

answerOptions.explanation: Correct; this is a feature of Text Analytics.
Incorrect; this is not a feature of Text Analytics.
Incorrect; this is a feature of Custom Vision.

questions.title: Features of Text Analytics
questions.text: Which of the following is a feature of Azure Text Analytics?

answerOptions.explanation: Correct; Custom Vision allows training of custom image classifiers.
Incorrect; Computer Vision API provides pre-built image analysis capabilities.
Incorrect; Text Analytics API is used for text data analysis.

questions.title: Custom Image Classifier
questions.text: Which Azure Cognitive Service allows you to train a custom image classifier?
